DOC.brief_summary: This study double-blind randomize control trial use intravenous magnesium versus placebo determine systemic magnesium decrease postoperative pain pediatric patient undergo tonsillectomy . Participants one two arm . Those Arm 1 receive magnesium ( 30 mg/kg bolus follow 10mg/kg/hr infusion ) Arm 2 receive equal volume normal saline bolus follow infusion ( placebo ) . The primary objective determine systemic magnesium decrease postoperative pain patient undergoing tonsillectomy . The secondary objective determine systemic magnesium administration associate decrease opioid-related side effect , decrease incidence emergence delirium , improve postoperative functional recovery . The study hypothesis use intravenous magnesium decrease postoperative pain , decrease opioid-related side effect , decrease incidence emergence delirium , improve functional recovery patient undergo tonsillectomy .
